headline: 2 Trump allies bought Tesla before Musk fallout, lawmaker trading reports show
summary: Congressional stock trading reports show that two allies of President Trump loaded up on additional Tesla shares as the relationship between the president and Elon Musk began to show signs of strain but before their falling out.

headline: Dimon says Trump tariffs may make 'the soft landing a little bit softer' instead of making the 'ship go down'
summary: The boss of the largest US bank expects to see the effects of tariffs in the coming months, and his hope is that the impact won't be dramatic.
